mapper.select: SELECT b.amount boAmount,b.time_limit termLoan,b.`name` boUserName,b.mobile,bc.card_no boAccNo,bc.bank boBankName, bc.bank_code boBankNo,ubi.id_no idCard,ubi.front_img idCardUrl,bc.phone transMobile ,b.order_no thirdTransaction, CASE ubi.sex WHEN 'ç”·' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as sex,uec1.`name` emergencyContact1,uec1.phone contactPhone1, uec2.`name` emergencyContact2,uec2.phone contactPhone2,uad.zhengxin_data creditReportUrl,cwc.vocation industry, bsc.contractId boContractNo,bsc.contrace_url agreementUrl FROM cl_borrow b LEFT JOIN cl_bank_card bc on bc.user_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN cl_user_auth ua on (ua.user_id = b.user_id and ua.id_state = 30) LEFT JOIN cl_user_base_info ubi on ubi.user_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN cl_user_auth_data uad on uad.user_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN cl_user_emer_contacts uec1 on (uec1.user_id = b.user_id and uec1.type = 10) LEFT JOIN cl_user_emer_contacts uec2 on (uec2.user_id = b.user_id and uec2.type = 20) LEFT JOIN best_sign_contract bsc on bsc.contractId = b.contract_id LEFT JOIN cl_w_contacts cwc ON cwc.phone = b.mobile WHERE b.borrow_type = 'X' and ubi.id_no is not NULL and ubi.front_img is not NULL and b.state IN ('20','26')
